title: The Cites of New Jersey, Essex is a City
tags: Mejia (probable) D-11 victory has sent NJ social and legacy media into overdriveNew Jersey‘s special election on Thursday night to replace Governor Sherrill’s District 11 seat did not go as planned. Analilia Mejia a late entry, but well known in labor and organizing circles emerged as a formidable candidate and as of this writing still holds a scalpel edge overSprawlismL. Lo Sontag
